species.name: cetitan
descriptions: Ice energy builds up in the horn on its upper jaw, causing the horn to reach cryogenic temperatures that freeze its surroundings.
This Pokémon wanders around snowy, icy areas. It protects its body with powerful muscles and a thick layer of fat under its skin.

abilities.name: thick-fat
abilities.effect: Halves damage from fire and ice moves.

abilities.name: slush-rush
abilities.effect: During Hail, this Pokémon has double Speed.

abilities.name: sheer-force
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves with extra effects to 1.3× their power, but prevents their extra effects.
